page.title: 03ST.JAMES'S WOLLASTON-MOVING!
page.content:
Fourth year pupils of{St.James's are in a brand new 'high tech' building,here are their thoughts. {* * * * * * * } "When I first came here,I thought another boring modern classroom with windows like Presto's, with all those handles, but when I got inside I thought 'What a place-but it's still school!'"
"It looks a bit like a space centre, with wooden beams brought over from Canada. The library was transformed from an old barn to an exciting room, now having over five thousand books."
"The best thing about the new school is the dinners, they are paradise."
By{various fourth year pupils.
